name: Mrs. Henrietta O'Joshua
greetingText: One with so much Grace and Poise
wishText: Mummy J you've been such a blessing to our lives and God knows we wouldn't be here without you. So enjoyyy ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to send to you as a text...lol
text4: I realised, I needed to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
